title: Ground News - Canadian Mounted Police May Arrest Suspect in Murder of Sikh Leader
text:
Summary by 大纪元 www.epochtimes.com According to the latest disclosed information, in the case where Sikh leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar (Hardeep Singh Nijjar) was killed by a spear in BC, the police have been monitoring the two suspects and are expected to arrest them soon. Share menu More
